name: Beat1XRadio
0:
”Alexa, open beat one x. radio”
”Alexa, start beat one x. radio”
”Alexa, ask beat one x. radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beat one x. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get ready for an experience like no other in Sheffield City. Beat 1x Digital, founded by 1 of Sheffield's most all rounded creative, TDX Campbell, is created to electrify your senses with a relentless fusion of pulsating rhythms, the smoothest vibes, and the freshest frequencies. In everything we do, we push barriers to ensure any B1X moment is a lasting good memory.

Step into the world of Beat 1x Digital and immerse yourself in a dynamic playlist that transcends genres. From the soulful melodies of RnB to the infectious rhythms of reggae and high-energy hip-hop we've got it all. And if you're vibing to the UK Garage scene or craving the vibes of Baseline, we've got a bit of this too. It's an auditory journey that keeps the street culture alive and thriving.

At Beat 1x Digital, we've captured the essence of pirate radio and fused it with a legitimate platform. That means less chatter and more of what you love – the music! We're all about keeping the energy high, the vibes authentic, and the music uninterrupted. It's the spirit of pirate radio without the interference.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
